roleset.name: cut-off or aviod standard procedure
roleset.note: SHORTCIRCUIT-V NOTES: Frame file created by Arrick based on ebc. Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4. (from shortcircuit.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: But now it looks like we may shortciruit that.

example.name: usually ergative
example.text: When the swaying of the building woke me up, I reasoned that a) I was in Southern California; b) the bed was moving; c) it must be a Magic Fingers bed that-1 [*T*-1] had short-circuited.
